professional.name: Tommy Joe Awe
professional.bio: He provides year round guide service on the Salmon River. He is always keen to share his love of whitewater rafting. He is hardworking person and will help you have the best experience of a lifetime. He is  a graduate of Sweet Water Guide School out of Big Timber Montana.

professional.name: Dina Medio
professional.bio: When not busy on the river she is an online ESL teacher and an inspiration to children. She earned a master’s degree in English Literature from San Francisco State University.  She is a bit newer to the team and is great for beginner and intermediate rafting adventures.

professional.name: Eda Brown
professional.bio: Born and raised in Richmond, California. Eda started training as a river guide at age 18 with one of California’s first river rafting outfitters. She is an experienced guide with a patience of a saint who will work hard for you. She is a mother of 3 beautiful girls.
